name: Conoctium 2
description:
Hi guys, 

this is just a piece of gameplay I wanted to share with some friends and old colleagues

Pierrick - Loic - Cédric - Patrick - Matthieu - Simon - Téo - Baptiste - Guillaume  

the zip contains the raw build of a piece of game, escape to quit anytime.

The game is under folder Windows_no_Editor under name "test_multiplayer"

Controls : 

Left stick to move

"A" button (Xbox controller) to Jump

Left and Right trigger to attract or repulse from the second player
